name: Operation Abyss: New Tokyo Legacy / 東京新世録 オペレーションアビス
description: When reports of kidnappings and strange incidents begin to break out across Tokyo, Hinowa Academy's very own Xth Squad is dispatched to investigate and neutralize the imminent danger. Loyalties will be questioned and secrets will be exposed as they desperately search for the truth!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 Processor: Core i3-2100 3.10 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8600 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 Processor: Core i3-6100 3.70 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
